name: Food Orchid
description:
Try and beat the High scores of your friends by trying out your aiming skills at this fruit orchard game. Grab your bow and arrow to play with them.

Aim for the target fruit which keeps changing after certain interval of time. The timer allows you to improvise your game skills. You're rewarded with 5 extra seconds on hitting the right fruit. But for every wrong fruit your time decreases by 3 seconds. Play with unlimited arrows, and try beating your own high score within the time limit.

 

Features:

  • Easy touch controls, and Bow and Background upgrade options with future updates.
  • Offline and Easy to play.
